page.title: 16LOCAL ATTITUDES,CARSPHAIRN
page.content: 12% of the population was interviewed. {COUNTRY LIFE}All like living here and they enjoy the peace of an isolated area.Most mention the occasional wintry weather but overall it has little effect as people adapt accordingly.All are hopeful about future country life.Most welcome plans to build two council houses. {ISOLATION}Disadvantages of living far from towns,lack of convenient public transport and lack of prompt emergency services are outweighed by the benefit of living in quiet countryside with helpful friendly people and also being without crime,drugs and vandalism. {TOURISTS}Nearly all would welcome more tourists who could be attracted by better amenities,including public toilets. {JOBS}Most want more jobs in the area so that young people will stay here.
